word:
The hour of Christ's triumph has come. The Lord has broken His bonds in sunder. Christ came forth from the tomb proclaiming, "I am the resurrection, and the life." The Saviour's words to His disciples were fulfilled. [John 16:19, 20, 22, quoted.]--Ms. 111, 1897. 

White Estate Washington, D. C. Entire Manuscripts: 91, 101, 111, 1897 August 4, 1983
